navigate.info: Mateusz Kaproń I am a front-end developer

sectionOne.description: My name is Mateusz Kaproń, I come from the Lublin area and I am a Front-End Developer.
sectionOne.experience: I have a higher IT education and over 2 years of experience in working as a JavaScript programmer.
sectionOne.programming: I am a Front End developer specializing in creating web applications. I'm looking for a job as a front-end developer. Currently I am focusing on learning TypeScript and Node.js
sectionOne.ignite: Please see my projects and on Github :)

contact.find: You can help me by e-mail or find me on social networks.

project.name: Online courses
project.desc: Test application for selling courses via the Internet, extended with the option of paying by credit card
project.description: An application for selling courses via the Internet, extended with the possibility of paying by credit card (stripe)

project.name: Baflix application
project.desc: The Baflix application is a movie viewing service, it is modeled on a popular site.
project.description: The Baflix application is a movie viewing service, it is modeled on a popular site. Photos and movies are stored in the Mongodb database. This is a test application. There are no movies due to copyright.

project.name: Programming blog
project.desc: Blog about programming in JavaScript and more
project.description: An application designed to broaden the knowledge of backend and interaction with the Mongodb database. The implemented backend allows you to log in, register, add new articles, delete your articles, add comments to articles, add 'Like!' to the article and comments, user name and password change, and a token is generated for each user and a session with the user is maintained on this basis.

project.name: Firebase application
project.desc: Application for adding articles saved in the firebase database.
project.description: Application for adding articles saved in the firebase database. Ability to add your own notes that are saved in the database. To add, please register.

project.name: Full-stack application
project.desc: Full-Stack application. Adding notes, twitters and private messages.
project.description: Full-Stack application. Adding notes, twitters, private notes. Read and write everything from mongoDB database. Premium option - watching movies

project.name: E-Commerce Application
project.description: E-Commerce Application. Online store written in React. The application allows you to add new items for sale such as phones, computers and gadgets. A basket has also been implemented that lists all products and the total cost of payment for purchases.

project.name: Covid-19 application
project.desc: Application with the latest information about corona virus infections in the world
project.description: Application with the latest information about corona virus infections in the world. The ability to view all countries and their daily increment - new, all or active covid-19 cases has been implemented. The possibility of viewing detailed information on covid-19 in all voivodships in Poland has been implemented and all cases of covid-19 around the world and graphs of relationships between these data have been displayed.

project.name: Movie search application
project.desc: Application for browsing and searching for selected movies.
project.description: Application for browsing and searching for selected movies. The possibility of viewing the description of the film and its average opinion has been implemented. The movie database is downloaded from an external API.

project.name: Application for adding posts
project.desc: Application for adding posts stored in the mongodb database
project.description: An application designed to learn backend. The functionality of adding a post, editing, liking, and removing from the MongoDB database has been implemented.

project.name: Application for adding Notes cz.1
project.desc: Application for adding notes, articles and twitters
project.description: Application (from React course 1) for adding twitter notes and articles, part 1

project.name: Application for adding Notes
project.desc: Application for adding notes, articles and twitters part 2
project.description: Application (from React course 2) for adding twitter notes and articles. Thanks to this course, I expanded my knowledge of React and learned some interesting tools in it, such as PageContext, Styled-Components, Storybook and Axios

project.name: Weather application project
project.desc: Weather application part 2, extended with new functionalities
project.description: An application for viewing the current weather (temperature, pressure, wind strength, precipitation possibilities) in Poland and around the world. The application gets data from every major city. The possibility of checking hourly or 5-day weather has also been implemented. Charts (line and bar) have been implemented to show the average temperature in a given locality.

project.name: Weather application
project.description: The Weather Application, downloads data from an external server and displays it accordingly

project.name: Hotel application
project.desc: Hotel application data downloaded from Contentfull
project.description: Application for hotels. Room data retrieved from Contentfull. Advanced room search engine implemented. Possibility to search for a free room at: price, type of room, number of people, whether with breakfast or with pets. Descriptions and photos of all rooms as well as additions that are in it have also been implemented.

project.name: Generating users
project.desc: Application to generate random user, exchange rate and weather
project.description: Application to generate a random user, display the current exchange rate and weather based on his origin, and display historical data based on his date of birth. The application uses 4 different external APIs. I created it for educational purposes, to expand my knowledge of API and Fetch.

project.name: To-Do
project.description: Application with tasks to be performed

project.name: Meme Generator
project.desc: The application downloads data from an external API and generates about 100 photos.
project.description: The application downloads data from an external API and generates about 100 photos that can be modified by adding your own text.

project.name: Encryption application
project.description: An application for encrypting and decrypting messages, and for generating a random password with a certain criteria.
